description: A must-have side for your Christmas or Sunday roast. Add a terrific crunch to roast potatoes with this clever polenta and thyme coating.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Dec 2021,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Thyme & Crispy Polenta-Coated Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Place potato in a large saucepan and cover with cold water. Bring to the boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes or until potato is tender when pierced with a fork. Drain potato, then return to pan and shake over medium heat for 1 minute to rough up edges and dry out. Add polenta, then toss to coat.

Heat oil in a shallow roasting pan in oven for 5 minutes. Remove pan from oven. Add potato, then carefully turn to coat in oil. Add thyme and season with salt. Bake potato, turning occasionally, for 45 minutes or until golden and crisp. Serve.
